_sText:
The action takes place in a small abandoned village.

1.General Information
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~	
	Title ............ zm_horror_on_the_road2
	Date ............. 4 October, 2010
	Version .......... First
	Author ........... Malozemov Uri $$ur4ik$$
	E-mail ........... ur4ik456@mail.ru
	Other maps ....... zm_Island_of_Death_beta, zm_lost_hotel_v2, zm_horror_on_the_road, ze_infested_prison_escape and other
2.Play'n'Map Information
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~	
        Max players ...... 68
	Editor used ...... Source SDK sp3
	Build Time ....... 3 days
	Compile PC ....... Intel Core 2 Duo MHz / 3 gb (Windows XP Sp3)
	Compile time ..... 5 Min 59 Sec. 
        HDR.................. No
3.Map Installation
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	Unzip all files into your cstrike\maps  directory
